name: NFTCircle
description: NFTCircle.io offers a new generation of NFT through AR by Toppan Tabitori and visual art under ARTMYN for the art ecosystem. NFTCircle.io Token (NFTC) is based on the NRC20 Token issued by the NULS main network. It can be freely circulated across multiple chains in NULS multi-chain network. It will be the governance points certificate of the nftcircle.io platform. The 40% commission generated by the platform will be used to purchased back the NFTC. These purchased NFTC will be destroyed to increase the scarcity of the token.
